keywords.cdata: accountability, Accounting, agricultural activities, agricultural production, annual budgets, Auditing, auditors, basic services, cash transfers, COMMUNITY INFRASTRUCTURE, Competitive bidding, consolidation, contract award, contract management, devolution, diagnostic tools, district governments, drinking water, drought, economic activity, employment, Environmental, environmental impact, expenditures, Financial Management, financial resources, flood damage, flood damages, flood protection, households, housing, income, irrigation systems, local government, local governments, operating costs, performance indicators, private property, productivity, Provincial Government, public works, purchasing power, rivers, roads, safe drinking water, Safety Nets, sanitary facilities, sanitation, sanitation systems, savings, schools, social services, sustainable management, tax administration, technical assistance, urban areas, urban communities, WATER MANAGEMENT, water storage, water supply, water supply systems, water use, Water users,

project_abstract.cdata: The proposed additional credit and the reallocated amount for Pakistan will help finance the costs associated with the new activities that include, (i) repairs of breaches in canal embankments, removal of debris deposited in the canal prisms and repair of control structures, drainage structures and water storage infrastructure; (ii) re construction and/r repairs of damaged roads, culverts and bridges; (iii) repair and/or reconstruction of public buildings such as schools, health facilities and buildings; (iv) repair of damaged drinking water supply and sanitation systems; and (v) assisting households and families to reestablish their livelihood by helping in the reconstruction of their houses, restarting their agricultural activities by providing agricultural technology packages, restocking their livestock devastated by the floods and earthquake and providing livelihood support to households and individuals affected by the disaster. There will be no change to the ongoing project activities.
